headline: The Jolt: Marjorie Taylor Greene to deliver America First response to Biden speech
author: Tia Mitchell
sentences: In briefings with reporters Monday that we were privy to, White House press secretary Jen Psaki said Biden will address inflation directly by pitching his Build Back Better bill to cut costs for health care, child care, and prescription drugs- and hell push for more American manufacturing as a way to control supply chains.
